title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5200.2 - Definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5200.2 - Definition

State Regulations

Direct dispatch means that the public safety answering point
(PSAP) can, by encoding or toning, alert the responding agency without having
to relay or reroute calls unless the call originates outside the jurisdiction. All PSAPs shall have the capability of direct dispatch as so
defined. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5200.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
